subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Final 6 from EVP maker experiment
author: Stefan Bion
full_text:
Hi,

what could be tried next is using "true" random instead of the
mathematical pseudo random number generator, which perhaps gives "them"
more possibilities to influence the system. To achieve this, the output
of a radio which is tuned to "white noise" (or hiss) can be connected to
the input of the soundcard, and in EVPmaker the option "Extras > Random
Source > Sound card" can be selected to make the program read the
noise signal from the radio and use it as a source for random numbers.
Perhaps it's easier for the "guys" (& gals) to influence the radio in
order to send us their messages. Who knows...?

Stefan
